manifest.install:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_hx_alert_list` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '公众号ID', `title` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `loops` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '循环次数', `items` text NOT NULL COMMENT '弹出文字', `createtime` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_hx_alert_reply` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '规则ID', `title` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `picture` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动图片', `description` varchar(200) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动描述', `gzurl` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `createtime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idx_rid` (`rid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
manifest.uninstall: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_hx_alert_list`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_hx_alert_reply`;
